channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim's Most Loved New Fashion
channel.desc: Kim's Most Loved New Fashion.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Transform your wardrobe with up to 50% off in the MarlaWynne Sale at QVC. Discover chic, versatile pieces at amazing prices and elevate your style for less.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Silver Jewellery Edit
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite silver jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion with Finery
channel.desc: Discover Finery London, a womenswear brand with a focus on making modern, inspiring and sophisticated styles accessible without compromising on quality. Wardrobe overhaul, you say? Yes please.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Finery London
channel.desc: Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ashwood Accessory Gifts
channel.desc: Give the gift of a beautiful new bag with a little help from our showcase of gorgeous Ashwood accessories. From pretty purses to cutting-edge cross-body designs, find something they'll love.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Footwear Sale
channel.desc: A fan of fashionable footwear? Find a new pair or two and save up to 50% on a range of stylish and comfortable footwear in our sale.

channel.title: Up to 50% Off Fashion
channel.desc: Fill your wardrobe with gorgeous fashion from a host of big names, and save up to 50.

channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Step into Style with Sam
channel.desc: Step into Style with Sam.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Gifts
channel.desc: Diamonique is the finest simulated diamond in the world. In this show we present a range of rings, earrings and pendants to help you find the perfect present for a loved one - or a treat for yourself.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade Outerwear
channel.desc: A wide range of high-quality, fashion-inspired coats and jackets in soft, luxurious fabrics. This competitively-priced collection is designed to complete your daytime or evening look to perfection.

channel.title: Loungewear
channel.desc: Relax in style with our wonderful selection of loungewear. Wonderfully warm separates in cosy fabrics will help you to make the most of your downtime.

channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.
